DataElement.preferredName: Medication Negation Taken Patient Compliance Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to a patient not taking their medication over a two week time period for reasons other than forgetting to.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Having been accepted for some purpose; ingested as a medication.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Taken; having accepted for some purpose.:Patient Compliance is the extent to which the patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Having been accepted for some purpose; ingested as a medication.
The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: People sometimes miss taking
ReferenceDocuments.description: People sometimes miss taking their medications for reasons other than forgetting. Thinking over the past two weeks, were there any days when you did not take your breast cancer medicine?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: People sometimes miss taking their medications for reasons other than forgetting. Thinking over the past two weeks, were there any days when you did not take your leukemia medicine?
